on reading compounds: 海嘯【カイショウ】tidal bore, eagre, rumbling noise that accompanies a tidal bore, tsunami, tidal wave
虎嘯【コショウ】tiger's howling, being out and active in the world (of a hero, etc.)
kun reading compounds: 嘯く【うそぶく】to boast, to brag, to recite (a song or poem to oneself), to bark, to roar, to howl
